sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content:
DrawDay Solutions ("we", "us", "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use DrawDay Spinner and related services.

We comply with UK GDPR and data protection laws to ensure your personal information is handled responsibly and transparently.

sections.title: 2. Information We Collect
sections.content:
We collect different types of information depending on how you interact with our services:

**Personal Information**
• Name and email address (when you contact us)
• Company information (for business accounts)
• Payment information (processed securely via third-party providers)

**Usage Information**
• Browser type and version
• Device information
• IP address (anonymized)
• Service usage patterns

**Competition Data**
• All competition and participant data remains local in your browser
• We do NOT have access to your competition participant data
• Winner selections are processed entirely on your device

sections.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
sections.content:
We use collected information for:

• Providing and maintaining our services
• Processing transactions and sending related information
• Responding to customer service requests
• Sending administrative information and updates
• Improving our services and developing new features
• Complying with legal obligations
• Protecting against fraudulent or illegal activity

We will never:
• Sell your personal information
• Share your data with third parties for marketing
• Access your competition participant data

sections.title: 4. Data Storage and Security
sections.content:
**Local Storage**
DrawDay Spinner operates primarily as a browser extension where:
• All competition data is stored locally in your browser
• No participant information is transmitted to our servers
• You maintain full control over your data

**Our Systems**
For account and support data:
• Data is encrypted in transit and at rest
• Servers are located in secure UK data centers
• Access is restricted to authorized personnel only
• Regular security audits are conducted

sections.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking
sections.content:
We use essential cookies to:
• Maintain your session when logged in
• Remember your preferences
• Ensure security features function properly

We use analytics cookies (with your consent) to:
• Understand how visitors use our website
• Improve user experience
• Measure marketing effectiveness

You can control cookies through your browser settings. Disabling cookies may limit some features.

sections.title: 6. Third-Party Services
sections.content:
We may use third-party services for:

**Payment Processing**
• Stripe for secure payment handling
• We don't store credit card details

**Analytics**
• Google Analytics (anonymized data only)
• Performance monitoring tools

**Support**
• Email service providers for customer communication

These services have their own privacy policies and data practices.

sections.title: 7. Your Rights Under GDPR
sections.content:
You have the right to:

• **Access** - Request copies of your personal data
• **Rectification** - Request correction of inaccurate data
• **Erasure** - Request deletion of your data
• **Restriction** - Request limited processing of your data
• **Portability** - Receive your data in a portable format
• **Object** - Object to certain processing activities
• **Withdraw Consent** - Withdraw consent at any time

To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@drawday.app

sections.title: 8. Data Retention
sections.content:
We retain personal data for:

• Active accounts: As long as the account is active
• Support inquiries: 2 years from last contact
• Financial records: 7 years (legal requirement)
• Marketing consent: Until withdrawn

Competition data in your browser:
• Remains until you delete it
• We cannot access or delete this data

sections.title: 9. Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our services are not intended for children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately at privacy@drawday.app

sections.title: 10. International Data Transfers
sections.content:
Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than the UK. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, including:

• Standard contractual clauses
• Adequacy decisions by the UK government
• Your explicit consent where required

sections.title: 11. Data Breach Procedures
sections.content:
In the event of a data breach:

• We will notify affected users within 72 hours
• We will notify the ICO as required by law
• We will provide information about the breach and steps to protect yourself
• We maintain incident response procedures to minimize impact

sections.title: 12. Changes to This Policy
sections.content:
We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of material changes by:

• Posting the new policy on our website
• Sending an email to registered users
• Displaying a notice in the extension

Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.
